name: Userstyles.org - update of Super Style redesign
description:
Userstyles.org had a facelift recently (early 2011) and the style I was using, style 19082, became broken. 

So, using the same background (which I'm rather fond of), I made this skin so it can be used with the new design of the site and resembles the Super Style design a little.
